n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/security/authorizations/administration_rights begin -- Manifest -- SECURITY SCHEME: Administration Rights -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2021.04.15' ,p_release=>'21.1.7' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9006773697014439 ,p_default_application_id=>100 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'WKSADMIN' ); wwv_flow_api.create_security_scheme( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10328323081271560) ,p_name=>'Administration Rights' ,p_scheme_type=>'NATIVE_FUNCTION_BODY' ,p_attribute_01=>'return true;' ,p_error_message=>'Insufficient privileges, user is not an Administrator' ,p_caching=>'BY_USER_BY_PAGE_VIEW' ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
